snippet: The Japanese company agreed on Monday to buy the health care equipment maker Zoll Medical, as it looks to expand its presence in the North American market.
abstract: The Japanese company agreed on Monday to buy the health care equipment maker Zoll Medical, as it looks to expand its presence in the North American market.

byline.original: By MARK SCOTT and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: A Health Deal as Japanese Look Abroad for Growth
headline.print_headline: A Health Deal As Japanese Look Abroad For Growth
